asgn2Restaurant

Class LogHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn2Restaurant.LogHandler

  • public class LogHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that contains methods that use the information in the log file to return Pizza and Customer object - either as an individual Pizza/Customer object or as an ArrayList of Pizza/Customer objects.
    Author:
    Yu Gen Yeap and Anderson Lee

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogHandler()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static asgn2Customers.Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String line)
      Creates a Customer object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file.
      static asgn2Pizzas.Pizza createPizza(java.lang.String line)
      Creates a Pizza object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file.
      static java.util.ArrayList<asgn2Customers.Customer> populateCustomerDataset(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns an ArrayList of Customer objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.
      static java.util.ArrayList<asgn2Pizzas.Pizza> populatePizzaDataset(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns an ArrayList of Pizza objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.

    • Method Detail

      • populateCustomerDataset

        public static java.util.ArrayList<asgn2Customers.Customer> populateCustomerDataset(java.lang.String filename)
                                                                            throws asgn2Exceptions.LogHandlerException,
                                                                                   asgn2Exceptions.CustomerException
        Returns an ArrayList of Customer objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name of the log file
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Customer objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.
        Throws:
        asgn2Exceptions.CustomerException - If any Customer exceptions are caught in this method. Exceptions are then re thrown to the GUI
        asgn2Exceptions.LogHandlerException - If the log file it is searching for doesn't exist, if there was a problem reading the lines or closing the file.

      • populatePizzaDataset

        public static java.util.ArrayList<asgn2Pizzas.Pizza> populatePizzaDataset(java.lang.String filename)
                                                                   throws asgn2Exceptions.PizzaException,
                                                                          asgn2Exceptions.LogHandlerException
        Returns an ArrayList of Pizza objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file. .
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name of the log file
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Pizza objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file. .
        Throws:
        asgn2Exceptions.PizzaException - If any Pizza exceptions are caught in this method. Exceptions are then re thrown to the GUI
        asgn2Exceptions.LogHandlerException - If the log file it is searching for doesn't exist, if there was a problem reading the lines or closing the file.

      • createCustomer

        public static asgn2Customers.Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String line)
                                              throws asgn2Exceptions.CustomerException,
                                                     asgn2Exceptions.LogHandlerException
        Creates a Customer object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file. The format of each line is outlined in Section 5.3 of the Assignment Specification.
        Parameters:
        line - - A line from the log file
        Throws:
        asgn2Exceptions.CustomerException - - If the log file contains semantic errors caught by other methods. Exceptions are then rethrown into the GUI
        asgn2Exceptions.LogHandlerException - - If there was a problem parsing any customer objects from the line from the log file.

      • createPizza

        public static asgn2Pizzas.Pizza createPizza(java.lang.String line)
                                     throws asgn2Exceptions.PizzaException,
                                            asgn2Exceptions.LogHandlerException
        Creates a Pizza object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file. The format of each line is outlined in Section 5.3 of the Assignment Specification.
        Parameters:
        line - - A line from the log file
        Throws:
        asgn2Exceptions.PizzaException - If the log file contains semantic errors caught by other methods. Exceptions are then rethrown into the GUI
        asgn2Exceptions.LogHandlerException - - If there was a problem parsing any pizza objects from the line from the log file.
